analyzed: jātaka  eka ka nipāta  apaṇṇaka vagga
translated: The Jātaka🔽The Collection of Long Discourses🔽The Chapter on the Unwavering One
Homage to the Blessed One, the Worthy One, the Rightly Self-awakened One.
Some say that the unwavering state
Is the second one, the logicians.
Should take up the unwavering one.🔽The Unwavering One Jātaka, the first.
